attributes.action: DO NOT IMPLEMENT A CASHLESS SOCIETY AND KEEP BANK NOTES AS CURRENCY
attributes.additional_details: I want this debated in parliament and a vote held to enshrine physical cash in the UKs monetary system forever.
attributes.background: I want you to keep physical money in the UK ,as a cashless society would discriminate and would lead to a dangerous precedent as the govt would have the power to silence its critics by blocking their bank accounts , surely this cannot be allowed in a democratic society?

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588814
